Uses of Package
org.tigris.gef.base

Packages that use org.tigris.gef.base

Classes in org.tigris.gef.base used by org.tigris.gef.base
Cmd
          Abstract class for all editor commands.
CmdPrint
          Cmd to Print a diagram.
CmdReorder
          Cmd to change the back-to-front ordering of Fig's.
CmdSaveGraphics
          Abstract Cmd to save a diagram as Graphics in a supplied OutputStream.
Diagram
          A diagram is just combination of a GraphModel, a Layer, and a title.
Editor
          This class provides an editor for manipulating graphical documents.
FigModifyingMode
          This is the basic interface for all Modes that are manipulating the visual representation of the underlying model.
FigModifyingModeImpl
          This is the default implementation for all Modes that are manipulating the visual representation of the underlying model.
Guide
          Constrains interactions to certain coordinates.
Layer
          A Layer is like a drawing layer in high-end drawing applications (e.g., MacDraw Pro).
LayerDiagram
          A Layer like found in many drawing applications.
LayerManager
          This class implements a kind of Layer that contains other Layers.
LayerPerspective
          A Layer like found in many drawing applications.
Mode
          This is the base interface for all modes in gef.
ModeCreate
          Abstract superclass for all Mode's that create new Figs.
ModeCreateFigPoly
          A Mode to interpert user input while creating a FigPoly.
ModeImpl
          This is the default implementation for the basic interface of all modes.
ModeManager
          ModeManager keeps track of all the Modes for a given Editor.
PathConv
          Abstract class that defines a common interface to all of path-to-coord mapping objects.
Prefs
          This class contains preferences that control the behavior of the editor to make it the way that the user likes it.
Selection
          This class represents the "selection" object that is used when you select one or more Figs in the drawing window.
SelectionManager
          This class handles Manager selections.
